com.facebook.buck.util.hashing

Interface ProjectFileHashLoader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectFileHashCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFileHashCache, RecordingProjectFileHashCache, RemoteStateBasedFileHashCache, WatchedFileHashCache

    public interface ProjectFileHashLoader
    Load hashes of paths under a ProjectFilesystem.
